title: Minor timetable changes for bus stops across the Latrobe Valley bus network
articleContent:
Minor timetable changes for bus stops across the Latrobe Valley bus network

From 5 June 2022, some bus stops across routes 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12, 13, 14, 15, 21, 22, 30, 40, 41, 42 and 45 will have minor timetable changes to reduce early bus arrivals and excess journey times.

Passengers currently using the Latrobe Valley bus network are seeing buses arrive early at some bus stop locations. This results in passengers boarding the bus and then having to wait an extended period before the bus can continue its journey to ensure it adheres to the remaining timetable.

To reduce this issue, from 5 June 2022, passengers who use the below bus stops will see a timetable change of between 1-8 minutes. The change column shows how many minutes earlier each bus will arrive at stop locations to help eliminate early running and excess journey times.

The service frequency and service operating hours will remain unchanged for all affected bus routes.

To plan your journey, view the timetables for routes 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12, 13, 14, 15, 21, 22, 30, 40, 41, 42, 45, visit Journey planner or call 1800 800 007 to order a printed copy of your timetable.
articleDescription: From June 2022, some bus stops across routes 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12, 13, 14, 15, 21, 22, 30, 40, 41, 42 and 45 will have minor timetable changes.
